name: moskeija
description: Project for Accounting and financial in moskeija of Tampere

scripts.build:ui: cd ../ui && rm -rf build && npm run build && cp -r build ../server
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:ui && npm run depoly
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Mohamid Al-tueij
